downloadProgress.sharedArrayBufferNotSupported: SharedArrayBuffer is not supported in this environment.
downloadProgress.typicalIssue: This typically happens when deploying to GitHub Pages or other static hosting services that don't support the required CORS headers.
downloadProgress.solution1: Use the app locally (run npm run dev)
downloadProgress.solution2: Deploy to a service that supports CORS headers (Vercel, Netlify, etc.)
downloadProgress.solution3: Use a custom domain with proper CORS configuration
downloadProgress.solution4: Disable FFmpeg processing in settings and upload pre-converted audio files
downloadProgress.noteText: You can still use the app without FFmpeg by uploading audio files that are already in a compatible format (MP3, WAV, etc.).
downloadProgress.fileSizeUnknown: File size unknown - showing estimated progress
